meanings.definition: A substance that relieves nasal congestion by reducing swelling of the nasal passages.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a decongestant in my bag for when I have a stuffy nose.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended a decongestant to help clear my blocked sinuses.
meanings.sent3: The decongestant worked like magic, making my nose feel as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: After taking the decongestant, it felt like a weight had been lifted off my nose.
meanings.sent5: The decongestant acted swiftly, opening up my nasal passages with ease.

meanings.definition: A medication used to alleviate congestion in the respiratory system.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed a decongestant to help me breathe better.
meanings.sent2: I took a decongestant before bed to ease my chest congestion.
meanings.sent3: The decongestant made me feel like I could breathe fire, in a good way!
meanings.sent4: The decongestant was like a breath of fresh air for my lungs.
meanings.sent5: Using the decongestant felt like opening a window in a stuffy room, but for my lungs.
